ABOUT

This is a blog website that I have created myself. The blog framework is Hexo, used for the domain provided by GitHub. At present, I havenâ€™t figured out what to write, but I will probably write some algorithm tutorials or the like. In the future, I may consider buying a server and writing my own backend
